body:
Depends -- there's a fair amount of optimization yet to do (e.g., nil
checks) but I did turn it on and so it is now regularly tested.
I had hoped that Lynn Boger would be jumping on this, but I think she is
also dealing with more urgent bugs (like the giant
sections problem).  If no progress soon, I'll get back on it.


On Fri, Aug 26, 2016 at 4:51 PM, Keith Randall <notifications@github.com>
